data.text: @Steven_Woolfe They are so out of touch
@Steven_Woolfe @melindiscott Why should neutrality be forced on a nation if it’s wishes are otherwise?
@Steven_Woolfe @melindiscott It is a choice. The choice of the Ukraine people. I can’t believe you want one country to veto another sovereign nation? Really?

@CarolineMack18 @melindiscott Nato isn't a right it's a choice. That's what those experts said. They also said if Ukraine was like Finland, neutral this wouldn't have happened. Maybe it still would. But maybe they were also right.
@Steven_Woolfe A failed U.K. government energy policy. Politicians meddling in matters they don’t have a grip on and failing to be advised by those who do .

@Steven_Woolfe @melindiscott Nope I’m sorry I disagree. Every country has a right to self determination including former eastern bloc countries. It isn’t up to Russia to decide what happens outside their borders. I voted leave by the way

@melindiscott @CarolineMack18 I do believe that Ukraine has a right to self determination. My point is that Western NATO & EU expansionists  have blood on their hands because they strategically set out to do this. Now people suffer because of their greed and self interests to divi up the world as they see fit

@CarolineMack18 Seriously are you a BOT or someone who hasn't cared to research? Since'94 to today dozens warned NATO expansion would cause this from US Ambassador Russia (matlock), US defence Secretary (Perry), CIA directors (Burns) advisors (Kissinger) PMs like Aussie Keating.
